entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
